meanings.definition: Edamames: immature soybeans in the pod, typically boiled or steamed and served as a snack or appetizer.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on edamames during movie nights.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious edamames as an appetizer.
meanings.sent3: The edamames in the pod were telling jokes to the peas.
meanings.sent4: The edamames were like little green treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the edamames caught my eye at the market.
